item.title: Alberto Vázquez’s ‘Decorado’ Drops Trailer Ahead of Fantastic Fest World Premiere
item.description: Alberto Vázquez, the Goya-winning director of “Unicorn Wars,” has dropped the first trailer for “Decorado,” his latest animated feature, which will world premiere in Official Selection at Austin’s Fan

item.title: Dakota Fanning Horror Movie ‘Vicious’ to Debut on Paramount+ After Removal From Theatrical Calendar
item.description: Writer-director Bryan Bertino’s feature will premiere at Fantastic Fest after having previously been slated to hit theaters earlier this year.
